Action.author: clayton sims
Action.body: Kostas moving to you since Jason is out. I couldn't find a gerrit item for this one. What's left to get this merged?

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Clayton, all the sub-tasks of it are done. This story is now marked as done as well. Thanks for catching this. (Reassigning this to Jason for historical reference since he did all of the work.)
